multiQuestions.question: What is a Family Type?
multiQuestions.answer: Instance types that have similar hardware specifications (CPU, vRAM, etc)

multiQuestions.question: What is a security group?
multiQuestions.answer: An instance level firewall allowing you to restrict Ingress and Egress traffic by specifying what traffic is allowed to communicate with that instance

multiQuestions.question: What are some options of a Security Group to restrict inbound and outbound communication to an EC2 instance?
What protocols are supported by ALB?
multiQuestions.answer: HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SMTP, and NFS

multiQuestions.question: What protocols are supported by NLB?
wrongAnswers: HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SMTP, and NFS

multiQuestions.question: Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) balances traffic to a(n)
EC2 Auto Scaling scales instances inside of a(n)
When ALB uses HTTPS, what is the type of server certificate used?
What is Cross-Zone Load Balancing?
multiQuestions.answer: A setting for ELB. When enabled, ELBs will distribute traffic to targets across AZs evenly

multiQuestions.question: For Lambda, which policy determines what resources the function has access to while running?
For Lambda, which policy determines which AWS resources are allowed to invoke your function?

booleanQuestions.question: If an EC2 instance is stopped, ephemoral storage is lost
If an EC2 instance is rebooted, ephemoral storage is lost
By default, AWS Lambda encrypts your environment variables *after* the function has been deployed
